room_title: Escape room "Revenger's Rescue" by NWA Escape Room in Fayetteville (AR)
review: Our family of five (with kids aged 13, 10, and 7) chose the Revengers Rescue challenge, and though we did not solve the room in time, we had such a blast!! We thought the room was very unique and inventive. The place was clean and the staff was super friendly. It was a great hour of quality time together. We would highly recommend it!!

room_title: Escape room "Revenger's Rescue" by NWA Escape Room in Fayetteville (AR)
review: I've been to several escape rooms in this area and NWA Escape has been the best experience yet! Revenger's Rescue was a blast, even when we hit some snafus, we still had a blast! Will definitely return!

room_title: Escape room "Revenger's Rescue" by NWA Escape Room in Fayetteville (AR)
review: Had lots of fun with the family. The Revengers Rescue room was awesome. Can't wait to try out the other rooms.
